heronarts.lx
Class HeronLX

java.lang.Object
  heronarts.lx.HeronLX

public class HeronLX
extends Object

Core controller for a HeronLX instance. Each instance drives a grid of nodes with a fixed width and height.

public void setSimulationPixelStyle(int pixelStyle)
Sets the drawing style of the pixels in the simulation.

Parameters:
pixelStyle - Style of the pixel (Simulation.PIXEL_STYLE_SMALL_POINT=0 or Simulation.PIXEL_STYLE_FULL_RECT=1)

enableClientListener

public void enableClientListener()
Listens for UDP packets from HeronLX clients.

setKinetNodes

public void setKinetNodes(KinetNode[] kinetNodes)
Specifies an array of kinet nodes to send output to.

Parameters:
kinetNodes - Array of KinetNode objects, must have length equal to width * height

setKinet

public void setKinet(Kinet kinet)
Specifies a Kinet object to run lighting output

Parameters:
kinet - Kinet instance with total size equal to width * height

setDMXOuput

public void setDMXOuput(DMXOutput DMXOutput)
Specifies a DMX output object to run lighting output to display the RGB nodes given by this.colors.

Parameters:
DMXOutput - DMXOutput instance with total size equal to width * height
